fwiw, last time i was in a position like that, 'parted' found all my partitions and rewrote the partition table appropriately.
/ mwe: no, but parted, its console-based cousin  can.
you can read the man page for parted and see if that helps, but you probabbly want to make sure you've got somebody familiar to help when you do it.
gpart looks pretty good too though.
good luck, and don't give it up without a fight :)
